name: Emotiscope Spectrum
description: Live frequency spectrum visualization. Maps all 64 frequency bins across the LED strip. Each LED shows the magnitude of its corresponding frequency band with color-coded hue.
artistic_intent: Reveal the raw frequency content of the audio in real-time. Low frequencies (bass) appear on the left, high frequencies (treble) on the right, creating a traditional spectrum analyzer effect.

nodes.description: Map all 64 frequency bins across LED positions with smooth interpolation
Color based on frequency magnitude across spectrum palette
